body_html:
Okay, sounds good. Is there an easy way to tell Bazel to build with a contrib/ masking files in Tensorflow proper? Apologies if this is documented somewhere obvious!

On 4 May 2016, at 18:27, zheng-xq notifications@github.com wrote:

A good way to start with tf.contrib. Once it matures enough the TF team would move it to the core.

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
